name: Beta Technologies
overview:
Beta Technologies India Private Limited was established in the year 2005 as manufacturer, supplier and exporter.

Our Product Range: DVD Vending Machines Cigarette Vending Machines Snack Vending Machines Beverage Vending Machines Industrial AMF Panels Custom Automation Equipment

Certification & Membership; Certification Name: Certificate of Importer Exporter Code Certification Type: Foreign Trade Issued By: Foreign Trade Development Officer

Infrastructure: We have an advanced infrastructural set-up that is technically well equipped to meet the expectations of the customers and industrial standards. The unit is installed with the latest machines and instruments to give perfection in the machinery.

Quality & Testing: We are totally focused on maintaining higher quality standard in our range of products and for this, a comprehensive policy has been developed by us. Our product is safe in use. The durability of our product is quite high. Our appointed quality controllers keep a strict watch on the entire process, which starts right after the procurement of raw material and continues till the final dispatch of finished products.

Client Satisfaction: We are a client-centric organization and hence, attaining their complete satisfaction is our main objective. For this, we manufacture products using high grade raw material and components, complying with the customer’s requirements and set industry norms and standards. Moreover, we deliver our range at the location specified by the customer within the set time constraints.
